game.name: Kung Fu Street
game.description:
The big fighter of the street is ready to show off his ultimate Kung Fu skills! Hope you will help him to prove the world that he is an ultimate warrior! Join Kung Fu Street and get ready to enter a world where there is no shortage of dangerous enemies! Remember your enemies are equipped with the powerful weapons. So, try to be quick to kill all of them by kicking and punching. Start playing this immersive fighting game to enjoy a wonderful gaming experience! 

There is no need to worry since you are quite aware of the needful martial arts street fighting style. Use Self-defense Karate fighting techniques of affray fighting and Super Street fight. This kingdom is yours, so don’t allow any enemies to be a part of it and destroy it with their bad approaches. We know that you have the guts to win the battle against your enemies by defending your team with the implementation of fantastic fighting styles. Don’t hesitate in showing your intense fighting skills to survive till the end!

Move around the space using arrow keys or WASD and jump using the space key. You can kick and punch using key V. May be you fail in some initial attempts, but no need to worry if this happens. Don’t forget to replay the button to crush your enemies again at King Fu! Come forward and get ready to wear the crown of being the best Kung Fu fighter of the street! Good luck to play more fighting games on our website and have more enjoyment!
